subject: Basketball
Stadiums and Arenas
Trades (Sports)
Building (Construction)
lead_paragraph: Mikhail D. Prokhorov, the Russian billionaire who owns the Nets, held a wide-ranging news conference Tuesday at Barclays Center, which is under construction in Brooklyn.
snippet: Mikhail D. Prokhorov, the Russian billionaire who owns the Nets, held a wide-ranging news conference Tuesday at Barclays Center, which is under construction in Brooklyn.
